channel.title: 3 errors plz help
channel.description: i get these 3 errors when i try to add a event [code]src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:235: cannot find symbol symbol : variable GrimPrize location: class server.model.players.Client c.GrimPrize = 1; ^ src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:246: cannot find symbol symbol : variable GrimPrize location: class server.model.players.Client if(c.GrimPrize == 2) { ^ src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:366: cannot find symbol symbol : variable GrimPrize location: class server.model.players.Client c.GrimPrize = 3; ^[/code] it PI

item.title: 3 errors plz help
item.dc:creator: @tyler28852 tyler28852
item.description:
@tyler28852 wrote:

if you already declared it, make sure it’s “c.GrimPrize” and not “c.grimPrize”

Read full topic

item.title: 3 errors plz help
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

[quote=“Aintaro, post:3, topic:372655”]declare the variable grimprize in the client.java.

If you don’tk now how to do it, simply just paste this in your client.java or player.java

public int GrimPrize = 0;[/quote]i got 10 errors in total it decresed to 8 when i added in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: 3 errors plz help
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

declare the variable grimprize in the client.java.

If you don’tk now how to do it, simply just paste this in your client.java or player.java

public int GrimPrize = 0;

Read full topic

item.title: 3 errors plz help
item.dc:creator: @statPKscape statPKscape
item.description:
@statPKscape wrote:

Try putting a Capital ‘C’ where the errors are, C.yourcode if you get more errors then change back to normal c
